room_title: Escape room "Sinking Ship" by Try'n Escape in Denver
room_address: 19515 E Parker Square Dr Parker, CO 80134
room_description: Your team is trapped on the pirate ship Ghostly Seadog in the Atlantic Ocean. Due to a recent battle, your ship is taking on water and to make matters worse, half of your team is trapped in the chart room and the other half is trapped in the Captain’s Quarters. You must work together to find clues and solve puzzles to escape your individual rooms and come together on the ship’s deck. Once on the deck, you must escape to the lifeboat before the ship is submerged. Who will make it and who will be shark bait?
